translations.customInstructions: Prefer reusing existing keys under common.* for shared UI copy (actions, buttons, labels, navigation, statuses, errors). Only introduce page-specific keys when the text is clearly unique to that page and would not make sense elsewhere. Never duplicate common strings inside page-specific namespaces.

keypaths.customInstructions: Default to placing reusable strings under common.* with clear subcategories (e.g. actions, labels, states, errors). If a string is page-specific, create a page namespace and add the key there. Avoid creating page-specific keys for generic UI text that already exists or could live in common.
